price: Yεbεka akyerε wͻn sε: ”Monwura Amane-hunu gya no apono no mu nkͻtena hͻ afe bͻͻ. Nokorε sε, εhͻ yε efie bͻne paa ma ahomasoͻfoͻ no.
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā fabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
